titleStmt.title: Gods covenant the churches plea: or A sermon preached before the Honorable House of Commons at a late solemn fast, in Margarets Church at Westminster, Octob. 29. 1645. By Francis Taylor B. in D. pastour of Yalding in Kent, and a member of the Assembly of Divines.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, Francis, 1590-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Cotes for Stephen Bowtell, at the signe of the Bible in Popes-head-alley,

notesStmt.note: Order to print on verso of first leaf.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
